Unabridged

25 - Counsel Regarding the Work at Huntsville

Date: July 6, 1904 Location: Nashville, Tennessee Source: Ms. 139, 1904 Status: Previously unpublished
Context: The Oakwood leadership is transitioning. Ellen White writes to aid a successful transition.
     I write to our brethren in Nashville. I have not time to copy that which I have read to those assembled, but it will all be written out that you may read it.
